Package main

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Route
  • public class Route
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a route from an island to another. It is undirected

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance()
        Get the length of the route. Note this is not sailing time, sailing time is determined by route distance and the ship's sailing speed
        Returns:
        the route distance
